DOC.brief_summary: In this study the investigators want to comare safety and efficacy of two different metods to administrate insulin during parenteral nutrition.
DOC.brief_title: Tight Glycemic Control and Insulin Administration During Parenteral Nutrition
DOC.detailed_description: In this study the investigators want to compare safety and efficacy of two different metods to administrate insulin during parenteral nutrition.
DOC.criteria: Critical ill patients undergone parenteral nutrition Acute cerebral injury, pregnancy
